name: Lamina Eco AF 30F/-1C Long Synthetic Sleeping Bag

features: Eco design features recycled fabric, insulation, trims, storage and compression sack.
Proprietary, welded Lamina™ construction enhances loft and eliminates cold spots.
Recycled 20D nylon ripstop is lightweight and highly compressible.
Performance mummy cut efficiently minimizes weight.
Contoured foot box follows natural foot position for maximum warmth and comfort.
Performance mummy cut efficiently minimizes weight.
Tailored hood blocks drafts and seals in warmth.
Lightweight but durable two?way #5 zipper with anti?snag for easy entry and exit.
Two?way zipper allows for easy ventilation.
Recycled nylon compression sack and storage sack included.
tech_specs.\u2022 EN RATINGS: COMFORT 2° C | 35° F - LIMIT -4° C | 25° F - EXTREME -21° C | -5° F
tech_specs.\u2022 MAX USER HEIGHT: FITS UP TO LONG: 78 IN /198 CM
